Plan: 1 to modify.

Summary by type:
  materialized views: 1 to modify

Materialized views:
  ~ active_employees

DDL to be executed:
--------------------------------------------------

DROP MATERIALIZED VIEW active_employees RESTRICT;

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW IF NOT EXISTS active_employees AS
 SELECT id,
    name,
    salary,
    status
   FROM employees
  WHERE status::text = 'active'::text;
